answers.answer: We've all had one of these days and hopefully it's lot better for you tomorrow. My two year old has a cold s of sunny night so I've had 10 hours sleep in three days! Hoping for a good night sleep tonight as I'm starting to get it and the olbus oil is making me sicker :(  and the dog only stopped whining when my partner came home from work.
Also I hope you can get highlighter out your carpets x

Awww sweety,I'm so sorry you're having a bad day. I know how it is. I'll pray for you that tomorrow will be better. In the mean time give the baby some sleepy time tea (for kids of course and natural) and once he goes to sleep take a hot bath with a couple drops of tea tree and eucalyptus and relax.

Thank you all so much. I am glad in a way I am not the only one who has these days. Yet, sad others have bad days too. I will defentaly try to relax when hubby gets home. My son won't take a nap been trying for 2 hours.
Sadly my day just keeps getting worse. Ps. The bath didn't help.

I actually managed four hours of uninterrupted sleep! Why don't you see if your little one would like to have a snuggle and watch his favourite film with some snacks with you. That's usually a good option for me I get stuck watching kids programs but he will sit quietly with me so it's a small price to pay.

question: So I am 33 weeks pregnant.  I am having a horrible pregnancy with preeclampsia,  gestational diabetes,  gallbladder disease that is extreme. Anyways, I have a 2 year old and today he isn't listening. He was up most of the night. I got 2 hours of sleep and even our 2 dogs are not behaving. My husband and teenage son have men's bible study tonight  (which I want them to go) but I feel like poop. My back where my kidneys are hurt bad. When the baby moves it really hurts. I know I shouldn't complain but it has been a day.My toddler got into my husbands bible case and got his highlights. He drew all over himself (after he had a bath of course. Couldn't do it before). There is highlights on carpet. I just am ready for this day to be over.Thank you for letting me rant.
title: Not a question but having a bad day
